website_summaries.verdict: Animals, bright colors, and happy songs combine in an inexpensive mat that will entertain baby whether on the tummy, on the back, or sitting up.
pros: Mat and detachable toys can be washed
The mirror can be adjusted so baby can use while in any position
Babies also love the musical animals
Parents feel it's goodquality, despite costing less than similar style gyms
cons: Won't fold up for transport or storage like some other mats
Battery can't be replaced once it's dead

customer_reviews.title: Breaks after few months!
customer_reviews.text: My previous review I was so happy with this product. Well its been a few months and the musical giraffe started glitching and making horrible sounds. This is his favorite part of this toy and stops him from crying and now doesn't work. This is NOT repairable, as there is no way to open the giraffe or replace batteries. Its completely sewn shut. PREVIOUS REVIEW: He's a few months old and he's already working on his motor skills. I put the objects low enough so he can grab them and tug on them. Super easy to put together, took 5 mins. And he gets excited to play with it. Totally recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Steele

customer_reviews.title: Baby approved
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this thing. I got it when he was almost a month old (he basically laid there staring up at the toys) now he's 3 months and he loves it. He uses it at least 1 hour every day but sometimes up to 5 hours just depending on his mood. He will baby talk to the animals (in addition to the giraffe we added a monkey and a lion to the gym since it has extra loops). Right now it's definitely one of his favorite toys and its a great price, we we're not going to pay $50-$80 for a toy he'll grow out of in 4 months. This is a great product and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: my child didn't like this
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a cheaper alternative to our at-home baby activity mat as we were going to spend a week at the in-laws and I wanted our child to have an area where he could play. Needless to say, he was not interested in this at all!! I thought he would like it what with the bright colors and large cartoon-like characters, but he got bored after just a few minutes and start fussing. I tried multiple times but each time was the same. In comparison, we have a SkipHop activity gym at our house that he can play in for extended periods of time. Disappointing but it may work for someone else!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Feynman

customer_reviews.title: Attention keeping and fun for baby!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this (zippy zoo version) yesterday so I can’t comment yet on durability, but my 2.5 month son really likes it so far! It kept his attention for 30 minutes this morning; the circular rattle is his favorite so far. Love that there are different heights to place the toys and they are easily moved from one tie to the next depending on where you want them, i.e. near his face or feet to kick at. I added some other toys we had, and I love that you can switch them out. A big selling point for me was the mirror for tummy time. Lightweight, pattern isn’t overly loud or obnoxious, portable...highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: GunnarsMom

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a playmat
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean, vibrant colors. I like that is has the extra loops, so more toys can be added later. I couldn’t justify spending $100 on one of these mats for the little use it will get, so I took a chance and ordered this one. It works great to keep my little man busy for a few minutes when I need to set him down. I’ve even tossed it in the laundry and it washed up perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Burger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect activity mat
customer_reviews.text: My 4th son is a month old now and we wanted an activity mat for him to use now that he's alert more (and lord knows activity mats dont survive older siblings). I found this one on Amazon and the price was great! We use it every morning and its perfect. Easy to fold, machine washable, enough toys to keep his attention (and a mirror!) Without being TOO many toys/distractions/stimulation.
customer_reviews.author: Runnergirl014

customer_reviews.title: Love this mat!
customer_reviews.text: There are cheaper options out there, but this is a great product and with the price :) The arches are well supported and secure well to the base. The mat can be folded in half, so it doesn’t take up so much room. Lots of loops on the arches & the blanket to attach toys. Comes with 3 hangable toys and a mirror. The blanket base is good fabric. Overall nice quality and exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Lillian

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 1 day!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not one who usually writes reviews, but this item really disappointed me. The toy giraffe plays music which was awesome (other than you had to keep pushing its belly to keep the music going.) My daughter played on this activity gym for about 30 minutes. The very next day, the music no longer worked on the giraffe and there is no way to replace the batteries. The only way to replace whatever batteries it takes is to cut the stitching along the neck and sew it back up! Obviously not reasonable. The only reason I’m giving 2 stars is because my daughter still enjoys all the vibrant colors and animals/toys but loses interest quicker without the music.
customer_reviews.author: tracy

customer_reviews.title: Simple sweet attractive colors makes it a must have for a baby
customer_reviews.text: I tired couple of costly ones but this product material is better than those. It fulfills your baby requirement until 6-8 months .. colorful easy to assemble.. simple to use .. carry able. If they have different sizes it would make it more attractive and worthy. 3.5 star category.. from Dad
customer_reviews.author: RAVI

customer_reviews.title: Great for development
customer_reviews.text: This play mat is everything i was looking for. It's low tech and easy to use. My little guy spits up on it often but i throw the mat in the washing machine and it's good to go again. I like that i can move and add different toys to it to keep things interesting. I started using it around 5 weeks and now by 11 weeks old he's developing his hand eye coordination, it works on his eye sight and tracking objects as they swing around after he hits them. He spends lota of his awake time playing on this mat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have.
customer_reviews.text: This play mat is a must have for a young baby. It’s so simple but it keeps my baby entertained and engaged for so long. He has started reaching for things, grabbing things, batting at things, pushing up, rolling over, etc all on this play gym. The colors are great for stimulation. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: sophie

customer_reviews.title: No Complaints!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for. It was more affordable than some of the other versions I was perusing and my little one loves Sesame Street, so I went for it. He's super interested in the dangling characters and it's nice to be able to move them around to different hooks. This thing has kept him way more entertained than I expected. Happy baby = happy mama.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Colorful and fun
customer_reviews.text: This activity gym has been so great for my granddaughter. She loves the colors and the characters on it. She always smiles and talks while laying on it. It is really been a great addition for her. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Conbrio

customer_reviews.title: Cute Eye-catching Toy
customer_reviews.text: I really like this play gym. It literally took me 5 minutes to set up and my son loved the colors. The toys that come with it are vibrant and cute. They really engage my son. I wish the toys would be a bit lower. I got this for my son when he was 3 months old and the toys were a bit too high up for him. I had to attach additional rings so he could play with the toys. Other than that, I enjoy this play gym and it is great for tummy time because all the animals on the mat really grab his attention.
customer_reviews.author: Afrocurlitan

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price! Adorable colors!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, adorable! Very easy to assemble and instructions included. I really like the gender neutral, bright colors. There is something included for each corner of the mat. The giraffe in the middle is low enough for a one month old to reach and the music is cute. The duration of the music is short though. I would recommend for the price! Has been easy to wipe clean, but I have not washed the mat in the machine yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Baby boy loved it
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for our little guy when he was a couple months old. It took him a little while to actually enjoy being on the mat, but when he learned to interact with the toys it was a lifesaver to be able to put him on it and get a few things done. The only thing that could have been better is the the toys are too high up for baby to reach. The rings are not long enough so I added ones from another set I had to get the toys low enough for baby.
customer_reviews.author: H. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great playmat especially for the price. My son enjoys the musical giraffe, mirror and toy that rattles when hit. He started using this around 6-7 weeks old and some days can spend a good 30-40 minutes just cooing and batting and kicking at the toys. I like that there are multiple fabric hooks so you can move the toys from place to place. Right now he’s long enough where he can hit at some toys while kicking at the flower toy. We also get lots of smiles and funny faces from him while playing.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great for the
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter to bring to daycare since they didn’t have one for her (it’s a home daycare) to play on on the floor. Wanted something cheaper Incase it got ruined. This price point was perfect. I have a more expensive one at Home and I’m pretty sure she would choose this over that one if she could talk 😂 she seemed to love it everytime I pick her up she’s playing so happily on it!! Def recommend! The middle seahorse toy even plays music when squeezed! Batteries included :)
customer_reviews.author: kasey

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this he is entertained. Everything is colorful and catches his attention and he loves trying to reach for the little toys. The foam bars over the top can be removed and it used as just a mat as well. It was nice folding it up and taking it to my daughters dance class so I could lay my son down and let him kick around.
customer_reviews.author: Leah e.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't looking for anything fancy but when this arrived I was shocked with how cheap it was. The toys that hang down are of poor quality and it's really hard to get the music to play. I would only use this for traveling since it's so easy to fold and take with you.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina T

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shower gift and will keep your baby entertained for a good amount of time while you get things done around the house! Super easy to clean and store. I love that the mirror can be attached to the bars rather than hang - encourages neck movement which is super important. You can always add other toys to keep your babies interest. No need in buying more expensive gyms when this one does the job just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Krejci

customer_reviews.title: bright patterns, music toy broke after about 3wks of intermittent use
customer_reviews.text: The pattern is very eye-catching for a new baby, the material is easy to wipe clean. The musical giraffe toy began to cut the songs off after a few seconds of play after just a few weeks of intermittent use. No way to change battery or get to the musical component. If I could do it over, I may pay a few extra $$ for a nicer mat with longer lasting components.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Manning

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful play mat for baby!
customer_reviews.text: Love the variety of vibrant colors! My baby loves to look at and talk to the toys that come with this. The giraffe has 3 songs that it plays. The mat does a great job of not stopping spit up and slobber from soaking through to the floor underneath. So glad we purchased this!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Clopp

customer_reviews.title: Way to much money, all the toys you see ...
customer_reviews.text: Way to much money, all the toys you see hanging does not come with item and quality is very cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Delgado

customer_reviews.title: One for many stages
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this from day one. She regularly uses it from her 1st week. She loves watching, kicking, grabbing and chewing those toys hanging. She watches her self in the mirror for hours. Now she is 3 months old, she talks looking at the mirror. One toy that engages her for hours and help to improve her motor skill at all stages
customer_reviews.author: Priya

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for Baby's first toy(s)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when Baby was 2 months old. He is growing with it. Now at 3 months he likes to kick some of the hanging toys. He liked the giraffe first since it plays music. The mat connections are not too easy to put together. The loops where you put the plastic rings into are hard to open with fingers while trying to slip in the plastic rings. Other than that, the print and toys are vibrant colors and will definitely get baby's attention :)
customer_reviews.author: kitty chemist

customer_reviews.title: Happy for the price
customer_reviews.text: Happy for the price. These things are usually double this price (NO clue why!). A few toys are good, a few are lame, but you can hang anything you want, so it's no biggie. I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this mat! He’s 3 months now and just started noticing the toys hanging. I hung some other toys on the extra hooks. He will lay on this mat for a good amount of time. 30-40 min. He sometimes falls asleep on it too. The bright colors are great and fun.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Happy baby
customer_reviews.text: The boy is almost 12 weeks and loves this. It comes with some toys that hang including a giraffe that plays music. There are loops for additional toys and rattles. It’s literally the only place we can put him down when he’s awake and won’t freak out. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: ben heald

customer_reviews.title: Good but battery change for the giraffe?
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun play mat for my baby. We’ve owned several for our kids over the years and this one is just as good as the next. I haven’t figured out how to change the batteries on the giraffe toy which only lasted about 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Photo doesn’t show all the goodness :)
customer_reviews.text: Easy to out together, but also easily unhooked for washing. Baby wouldn’t be able to accidentally disassemble, though. You can’t tell from the pictures, but there are lots of little loops where you can add all kinds of toys with plastic rings so baby’s view is always changing. The colorful mat makes baby want to keep head up during tummy time :)
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn M.

customer_reviews.title: Most used baby item!
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was worth every penny--my son uses it every day! It doesn't come with as many toys as other options out there, but the toys it does come with are really entertaining for my baby. We already had a few other hanging toys that were really easy to add on with all of the extra loops that are sewn in to the hoop parts. I have been able to wash the mat in my regular washing machine and it went through just fine, with no fading. I also love the size. It's a great size for my baby, but doesn't overwhelm our livingroom. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey W.

customer_reviews.title: Everything and more
customer_reviews.text: This product was gifted to us as a used item and we loved it. The toy in the center has batteries and once it does, there was no way to replace them since the battery pack was sown into the stuffed animal. We decided to buy the same kind for our son and we know it will be everything and more as it was the last time.
customer_reviews.author: Celina Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Giraffe broke after 1 day
customer_reviews.text: The play mat is ok, but giraffe started giving interrupts in music and in a few minutes stopped playing music at all. Out of my curiosity I disassembled the toy and replaced 3x SR44 batteries. The toy worked for a few minutes and broke again. So it's not the battery issue, but clearly a defective chip.
customer_reviews.author: Alexei Zavjalov

customer_reviews.title: Love this activity gym
customer_reviews.text: Love this activity gym. It's exactly what a baby needs for good tummy time and playtime in general. With the mirror was a little clearer, but not that big of a deal really. Easy to put together and take apart for washing. Cute design and doesn't have all that extra stuff that other activity gyms have and the cost is much better! Also a good size. I have twins so they both are getting good use out of it!
customer_reviews.author: TrishaJB

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about buying as I am with most things on amazon, especially for my child, but when I looked at reviews I saw some good and some bad. I finally just went with it because for the price I really wasn't too worried. I've had this for a few weeks and I love it and so does my daughter. She's two months old and sometimes will cry until I put her on this just so she can stare at everything. I highly recommend this for any newborns, it's just so cute and fun for the little ones!!
customer_reviews.author: Nikitta René

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: If you want somewhere to plop your baby while you make dinner, this is a good place. The dangly things entertain my baby. He likes to try to eat the striped animal thing. The directions aren't great. There's one part that doesn't make sense, but it's not actually hard to put together.
customer_reviews.author: EricaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little exercise mat
customer_reviews.text: Love this, especially for the price. My son loves rolling around on it and grabbing at the toys. The mirror is a little funky, almost like a playhouse mirror, but overall a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley W

customer_reviews.title: Sound recover once it is gone.
customer_reviews.text: The Zoo gym is just as described in the photo, delivered within expectations. The three stars rating is because of the sound which in my case lasted only for 2 weeks and there is no way i can fix or change the battery. My daughter was used to the sound but now it is gone. For the price, there should be a way to fix it once the sound is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: That my grand son enjoys playing with the item.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grand son who was four months for Christmas. He loved the gift however when he pulled on the hanging animal the entire bar comes down. The bar could be made a little more sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: MrsKP!

customer_reviews.title: Great play mat.
customer_reviews.text: Baby is so obsessed. Very cute without being overwhelming like mats with flashing lights can be. My girl will lay and play for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Roberts

customer_reviews.title: BEST value out of all things baby
customer_reviews.text: This play gym is the best value out of all the baby gear I've purchased. We started using this play gym with our daughter around 2 months or so when she found her arms. She is now 10 months and still loves playing with it! The arches are soft covered foam which makes it safer for my daughter to move, roll and climb over. I am very happy I purchased this gym over the more decorative wood gyms that would have match our interior design better. Wood gyms wouldn't be nearly as fun or safe for our daughter to move and grow with.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice little play mat i hardly used it not for any reason other then not feeling like getting it out i just pulled the toys off and gave it to my son he doesnt like to lay around in one spot anyway. But its a good buy
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with this
customer_reviews.text: High quality material and finish. Bright colors and ability to position toys at different locations is very useful. Baby loves it!
customer_reviews.author: I Know

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and well made.
customer_reviews.text: Such a great product! I bought this for my grandbaby to use when she's at my house. She has a similar one at her house that cost more. This one is just as good. It is very easy to assemble. The colors are bright and pretty and the design is adorable. The hanging toys are cute and really hold her attention. She is just a month old and already reaching for and holding on to them. The gym folds up and I stick it in the corner out of the way until she comes back to visit. All in all a lovely product.
customer_reviews.author: OnlineShopper

customer_reviews.title: Great entertainment for a small infant
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves to look at himself in the mirror that comes with this. One of the toys attached makes a pleasant jingling sound and there are extra loops to add your own toys if you want. There are also loops on the mat so you can attach toys for tummy time.
customer_reviews.author: jess

customer_reviews.title: Stimulating and fun for baby! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Our 3 months old absolutely loved this playmat. The hanging toys and cross bars have bright colors and keeps the little one's attention quite a long time, sometimes even an hour. I think it's very stimulating for developing baby brain. Five starts money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: Oceanblue2001

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this and so does my son! It was easy to assemble and it is so adorable. It is also lightweight to move around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Keesh23

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Super Cute.
customer_reviews.text: We gave away our other one to someone that needed it. We order this one right after. We LOVE IT. It is so cute and the design was so much better than the first one we had. My baby plays with it and really goes at it. It hasn’t broken down even through the kicks and hits.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Really cute activity mat
customer_reviews.text: I really like this, so does the baby I take care of. It's bright and colorful and the toys are easy for him to reach. The price was really good too.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Hours of entertainment!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter (4 months) can spend hours on this! My mom has one at her house (the pink one) and she loved it so much we got her this one for our house. It has really helped motivate her to tolerate tummy time and she’s rolling like a champ. Definitely recommend for wiggly babies!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute and stimulating
customer_reviews.text: Great product! These things are always so expensive. My son and daughter love it! Lots of stimulating colors and things to look at. The giraffe also plays music. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Almost everything included
customer_reviews.text: The product is fine for what I paid. BUT! The mirror is missing. The booklet says it’s supposed to come with a mirror but it’s nowhere to be found.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Decent mat
customer_reviews.text: The problems I have with this mat is that the hanging toys come off easy. My 5 month old pulls them off with no problem and I have to keep putting them back on. Also I have only had it for a few months and the music battery has already died and there is no way to replace it. The music was what my baby liked the most.
customer_reviews.author: JaSae Small

customer_reviews.title: Colorful mat
customer_reviews.text: This is adorable. Has several places to attach toys. Hang them when they're tiny and attach them to the mat as they grow. Perfect for when my Grandson visits
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: My baby loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My 3month - now 4 month old baby loves this. Hang a couple toys on it and she is entertained for a good while. It has enough space for her to flip and she likes the toys it came with. The one thing I don’t like is the plastic-y feel of it when she falls asleep and her drool is stuck to her face, but it’s such an easy clean up that I really can’t complain. Overall I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Rakowitz

customer_reviews.title: Remove the sun attachment.
customer_reviews.text: Its nice but the only aspect not good is the little sun attachment is really easy to remove. Our6 month old grandson removed it by himself and since it is hard plastic and he is a banger of things, when he hit himself with it he received a black eye. We have since removed it from the area and will no longer use that aspect of the product.
customer_reviews.author: David Brown

customer_reviews.title: Just as described.
customer_reviews.text: My son keeps himself entertained with this gym set, the black and white toy really catches his attention I even unclip it and take it on the go for him.Its also not as big as others I’ve seen in store (target) and that’s fine with me since it’s a great space saver and I don’t have to put it away everytime it’s not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Elvm

customer_reviews.title: Baby's Personal Gym
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little gym for my new grandson and can I tell you, its amazing. He has fun and we all get a chance to have dinner while watching him be entertained. Also, the use of his legs, arms and core helps advance his development skills. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money but doesn’t last long.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really likes this play mat but we’ve barely had it two months and the giraffe has stopped working correctly. All of the sudden it stopped playing songs all the way through. And the batteries aren’t replaceable. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: AK47

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the baby
customer_reviews.text: This is a great play mat, at a great price. The play mat is easy to assemble and easy to throw in the wash when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany M.

customer_reviews.title: Fun Play Station
customer_reviews.text: Really colorful and fun for a baby to play with. Loved the musical animal in the middle and the mirror. I wish the music played just a little longer. Overall great product.
customer_reviews.author: tif

customer_reviews.title: Baby activity mat
customer_reviews.text: This mat we used with my grandson starting at 2 mos. He will play and talk to the toys and himself in the mirror. I bought it as a baby gift for a coworker. It's sturdy, practical and inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I had to order a second one of these to bring to my moms house. Great material and plenty big enough to use as a play mat
customer_reviews.author: Jessica aldridge

customer_reviews.title: Awesome playmate..
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it...he started playing and smiling on the minute we put him in it...he loves the music...tries to catch the toys and talk to the toys ... My baby is happy so we are happy.. and Amazon delivery was superfast...thank you..
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Musical plush quits working quickly.
customer_reviews.text: The mat is easy to clean and travel with. However, the musical giraffe toy quits working within a few weeks. I have been told the batteries can not be replaced, and you can’t buy a replacement toy. Annoying, and frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Ulrich

customer_reviews.title: great activity mat
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this activity mat! It’s a bit smaller than expected, but it works!! He loves the mirror and the toy giraffe that also plays music. It’s also perfect for tummy time :)
customer_reviews.author: mc.

customer_reviews.title: Giraffe dies within weeks of use
customer_reviews.text: While baby enjoys his playtime, it was less than two months before the giraffe died an no longer plays music. I contacted Bright Starts for a replacement and they said they would send one. It has been two weeks and not a peep from them. The giraffe is what makes this worth having. I would not buy it again based on the customer service and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Servs it's purpose for the price
customer_reviews.text: We have a bigger one that was 3x more expensive at home that our 3 month old loves. This is one we bought as a secondary one to have when visiting relatives. It is good but the music maker animal does not work most of the time. For the price is servs it's purpose of exercise and entertainment.
customer_reviews.author: Amy A.

customer_reviews.title: ... 6 month old granddaughter and she really seems to like it, she especially likes to look at herself ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 6 month old granddaughter and she really seems to like it, she especially likes to look at herself in the mirror. It's as sturdy as you would expect and the colors are bright and cheerful, it's great! Very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Basic
customer_reviews.text: This is basic, but you beat the price. We had this delivered to a vacation rental house for our 4 month old, and it was just what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and affordable
customer_reviews.text: So cute and perfect for the price. Only issue is the hanging toy. It's not long enough for baby to really enjoy. He likes to put the toys hanging in his mouth. But really good for the price
customer_reviews.author: L. Rivero

customer_reviews.title: Great activity mat
customer_reviews.text: Love the bright colors and the softness of the mat. The giraffe plays 3 or 4 cute, catchy tunes and that's a bonus as well! Nice also that you can detach and rearrange the hanging items; I'm planning on attaching some to my baby's car seat handle when he's older. Item was easy to assemble and didn't come damaged whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Katie R.Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 2 month old son absolutely loves his Sesame Street mat. It's never a fight to do tummy time or any other playing on the mat.
customer_reviews.author: Rouni

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 2-3 month old!
customer_reviews.text: Took me all of 10 minutes to put together. Perfect and entertaining for my 2 month old. I like How you can pick where the little toys and rattles go!
customer_reviews.author: Pe Miley

customer_reviews.title: Great activity mat
customer_reviews.text: I like this mat, it works great for my baby. I wish there were a few more toys though. My son isn’t at a point that he’s lifting his feet yet but I saw previous reviews and can see that his foot could easily get stuck in the ring toy once he starts lifting his legs and feet. Overall though I think it’s a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: My children love this mat. They have gotten so much use out of it and it is still holding up. Would highly recommend it was well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: phillip barnard

customer_reviews.title: Happy baby, happy mommy!
customer_reviews.text: The Bright Starts Kaleidoscope Activity Gym is great for my 2 month old who is starting to enjoy staring at the bright colored, hanging objects. We can watch the beads go round and round in the circle toy for ever. She also likes kicking the crinkle lyon that sounds like a bell. As a parent, I enjoy the gyms unisex colors so I can use it for our next baby, regardless of the gender!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Prendergast

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the money
customer_reviews.text: My baby had an alright time with this play mat. It looks a little cheap, but not terrible.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Washable, storable, flexible
customer_reviews.text: For Grandma's house. Easy to put up and to store. Tabs allow hanging of toys not included so baby's current favorites can be within reach. Baby has begun to turn over, so the flexible bars move with him. Easily disconnected so only the pad goes into the washer. When one grand has outgrown, it will easily fit in a small space awaiting the next Edition.
customer_reviews.author: AniLo

customer_reviews.title: Cute and colorful play mat for baby
customer_reviews.text: My baby likes the bright colors and shapes. It came fast and exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for use with babysitting my 4mo old granddaughter. She loves it! It’s lightweight and easy to move around. Great price and does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, fun. The giraffe is ehh
customer_reviews.text: The giraffe toy makes noises when you squeeze it but the battery in it hardly lasts a few months. I opened my box mid September and the battery in the giraffe is pooped out. Other than that the structure is sturdy enough but a little slippery. Has plenty of loops to hook the toys onto.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Boyd

customer_reviews.title: A good buy
customer_reviews.text: Good play mat, easy to clean and durable. The little toys that came with it leave something to be desired but I just used my own rings and toys. Would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: MV

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My 4 month old loves it. Keeps him occupied and talking away while i do little things here and there. Lightweight and easy to bring along for the babysitter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it’s beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect!! Floor mat washes easily in washer. Dry lightly in dryer. Baby loves the beautiful colors, loves the animals, loves the pattern on the crossover bands.
customer_reviews.author: lisa marie

customer_reviews.title: Music stopped working on day two.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my two months old child. His favourite part was the musical giraffe. The music in the giraffe stopped working on the second day. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ram Bista

customer_reviews.title: Very nice toy. Can't go wrong with this price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 2 month old for Christmas. Very nice, especially for this price! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: happysmiler37

customer_reviews.title: My Son's Favorite
customer_reviews.text: My son has been loving this play gym since he was 3 months (now almost since 6 months). He talks to the dangling pieces, and especially loves the giraffe. It's easy to clean -- my son has had multiple blow outs and spits up on the mat and it was an easy clean up. The only reason I'm rating this a 4/5 instead of a 5/5 is because the giraffe piece -- his favorite toy -- broke. The music doesn't work anymore, and I tried looking for a battery outlet, and nothing. The giraffe piece broke only after a month, and it was just hanging there.. :(
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: Great option for the price.  Not too fancy.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my infant. Only 4 stars because music inside giraffe is out of battery and there is no way to change it.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured parts missing worst customer service
customer_reviews.text: Not as shown in the picture .. many toys missing only 2 things came with it.. when called customer service they are saying they don’t have those parts and I should cut the mat in half n send picture Update : I have ordered replacement for the product and got the new one with all the toys
customer_reviews.author: Kanchan Patil

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT and you can’t beat the price
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT and you can’t beat the price!!! My son LOVES it, he’ll lay there and stare at everything it keeps him occupied and it’s fun to see him learning his surroundings.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Lee

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as one of my grandson's Christmas presents, and he adores it. It's easy to put together, brightly colored, and easy to transport. I highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice enough
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. It's not that expensive so the toys and over looks of it are kinda cheap but if you buy extra hanging toys you can make a good play mat. The size is bigger than other ones.. my twins can fit there easily. Over all I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Katia SkolTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Functions as baby distraction—err, learning environment.
customer_reviews.text: Unopened package was missing a hook on one of the arch-things. But it was no problem to MacGyver it with some things laying around the house. Baby is enhanced with the bright colors and hanging doo-dads. The adjustable mirror placement is great.
customer_reviews.author: Yelhsa

customer_reviews.title: Cant replace the batteries.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this thing but the giraffe that plays music ran out of battery power so fast (like within 2 weeks) and you cant replace the batteries so now it's just another hanging toy. Otherwise worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute great product for the price!!! Has lots of attachment options for toys I already have!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lainie Dahl

customer_reviews.title: Great activity gym, you should buy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it he’s three months old and loves to get busy exploring his sensory motor functions. You should buy it and try it out! It keeps my 3 month old lo’s attention for at least an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Guru

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: My niece loves this. Great toys and folds up nicely for easy storage
customer_reviews.author: Mr & Mrs Coffee

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: So worth the money! My baby has spent countless hours talking to herself in the mirror and this was the first toy she would actually take the time to play with. So easy to clean, trying to hook it back together though, can be a little time consuming.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Bright Starts Zig Zag Safari, Activity Gym
product_meta.description: Color:Zig Zag SafariFun Comes First! The Zig Zag Safari Activity Gym from Bright Starts is full of color and patterns that baby will love to play with! Toys include a zebra chime, baby-safe mirror, ring rattle, and leaf shaped toy. The mat is soft and padded for baby's comfort. High-contrast colors encourage baby's sensory development.
feature_bullets: 3 ways to play: active discovery, tummy time, and active play
Additional toys include: Zebra chime, Baby safe mirror, Ring rattle & Leaf shaped toy
Baby safe mirror for self discovery
Removable toy bar when only the mat is needed

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars2,230 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
